thread.title: How to FaceTime Your Banker: Just Stop by an ATM
thread.title_full: How to FaceTime Your Banker: Just Stop by an ATM

title: How to FaceTime Your Banker: Just Stop by an ATM
text:
How to FaceTime Your Banker: Just Stop by an ATM Written by: Carleton English 09/04/15 - 10:26 AM EDT Tickers in this article: DBD JPM BAC PYPL JWN 
NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- The velvet rope at your local bank used to mean only that you could expect to spend a long time waiting in line, most likely without even a lollipop for your pains. The next time you see one, you may think you're in a cocktail lounge. 
With communal seating areas, high top tables, and wifi access, JPMorgan and Bank of America try to provide a welcoming environment for clients who go to branches for home mortgages, car loans and customized financial advice, all of which are higher-value transactions than the old school visits to tellers to deposit or cash a paycheck. 
Say goodbye to tables stocked with a mixed-up stack of withdrawal and deposit slips and dried-out pens. Customers who want the basics can use ATMs that have video-chat capability and dispense cash in a variety of denominations, including $1, $5 and $10 bills as well as the ubiquitous $20.
